name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp styles.css main.js manifest.json /home/mouad/Documents/Obsidian/Cerveau/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-autocolor/

scripts.bpush: npm run build && npm run deploy
